body.name: Classic Messenger Bag - Stained Units - Cotton Canvas Shoulder Bag
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 4 mins
features: Closure type Flap, Hook and Loop, Zipper
Item Display Dimensions 17.5 x 5 x 5 inches
STAINED AND DAMAGED - Please note that this item has a stained inner front flap and is priced lower to liquidate.
ROOMY, OPEN POCKETS - Features an extra large main compartment, front pockets, and side pockets big enough for all sizes of water bottles.
HEAVYWEIGHT MATERIALS - Made of durable, 100% cotton canvas with metal accents. Front flap has a Velcro closure. Does not have padding or additional structural support.
CLASSIC STYLE - Retro military shoulder pack made in a light drab green faded cotton canvas with rugged design. Great for everyday use, school, college, basics, and travel accessories.
DIMENSIONS - 16 x 10.5 x 5" main compartment. Weighs only 1.2 lbs. Easily fits all laptops 13", 14", and up to 15.6" (but does not include padding). Includes a 1 year Limited Warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic bag at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: About 20 years ago, I had a canvas messenger bag that I loved. Olive green, very simple, 2 pockets, everything I needed for a walking commute. I stopped using that bag when I started carrying a laptop, and got more and more complex bags and briefcases. Now, finding myself needing a simple bag to go to and from music rehearsals, but carry a binder, microphones, folding stand, in-ear-monitors, etc., I went back to basics.I couldn't be happier with this bag. The price was super affordable, and compared to the looks of other similarly-priced bags, it seemed higher quality, thicker material. And I was right! It practically feels padded with how thick the canvas is, and I think that's helpful for some of my electronics. I'm not sure I'd entrust it to carry an expensive laptop and protect against a drop, so I would get a secondary padded bag if I needed that (and that's what I recommend for you if you are planning on carrying this for laptops).The front 2 pockets are roomy, and the velcro attachment to close the bag accommodates a LOT. You can fill the main compartment and both pockets as full as they'll go, and it will still close. The only time I couldn't get it to close was when I tried to stash a microphone stand on top of the bag and have the front cover drape over top of it to secure it in place. And it only barely didn't work...I could have managed an umbrella or smaller object up there.I am very happy with my purchase. Thanks for reminding me that there are occasionally well-priced items that still maintain some aspect of quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great satchel. Durable, nice size, good length on the shoulder strap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent little bag. one con out of many positives.
reviews.reviewText: Its a decent bag. The only real big con is the handle is somewhat small for my hands, but other than that it feels comfortable and sturdy.I like how much it will stretch out for the adjustable shoulder strap. I actually had to do it halfway for me to feel just right. I enjoy the side pockets, i didn't know it came with side pockets initially, didn't notice it but they will hold a 16 oz bottle decently snug. Nothing bigger i think though. the two side pockets are nice. I only really use it to carry one thick reading book and a shirt but i know it can fit quite a bit more, but i don't like it to become bulky.Not really a con but the olive brown doesn't look to olive or green, mine looks more of a sand tan color but it looks nice. It did fit my 15 inch laptop quite fine but then i don't think id put anything else in there as to not damage the laptop i think.

reviews.reviewText: this bag is absolutely spacious and very sturdy! I like how it has water bottle holders and extra pockets inside ! makes everything easier :)

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality, great looking, superfast service.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect product. Headline says it all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hope you enjoy open-top bags
reviews.reviewText: Pro's-Durable & sturdy. I feel like this bag could last 20+ years, it's well made.-Lots of space. I fit all kinds of stuff in this bag despite it's low profile.-Adjustable shoulder strap that is semi-padded.Con's-The velcro is a joke. First off, there's not near enough. One thin strip on the inside of the flap & two small pieces on the side of the bag. Even when the bag is fully closed, the slightest bump or rub will cause it to seperate.Second, the placement of the velcro means if you fill this bag even some-what full, the flap cannot be velcroed shut. It will just lay there, flapping in the wind, completely unsecured.Third, why is there not two more pieces above the side pockets?? That way you can still secure the flap when the bag is full. This really boggles my mind - 10 cents worth of velcro & problem solved. If I have to go buy a glue-gun & velcro to use your product, there's a problem.-This bag could easily be 1-2 inches taller. I am constantly left wanting for this bag to be just a little bit deeper. Also, you can forget about toting your laptop around in this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For 25 bucks, absolutely no complaints. I get why people complain about the olive color, but as you can see in the pic, it's also not exactly brown. Next to different shades of brown, it's definitely a different color and people would also be mad if they called it brown. If you want a simple canvas bag, get this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good bag and can carry a good amount of items no problem. Nothing wrong with it and easy to take around. I also like how the texture feels and being able to put different types of customization
